sections.heading: Kubernetes Services
sections.content: Services provide stable network endpoints for Pods. Types include ClusterIP (internal access), NodePort (external access via node), LoadBalancer (cloud load balancer), and ExternalName (DNS alias).

sections.heading: OAuth 2.0 Implementation - Authentication
sections.content: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization flow with proper scope management, token validation, and refresh token handling. Use PKCE for public clients and validate redirect URIs to prevent attacks.

sections.heading: Database Backup and Recovery - Operations
sections.content: Implement automated backup strategies including full, incremental, and differential backups. Test recovery procedures regularly. Maintain backup retention policies and secure off-site storage.
